thread.title: Arsenal revive CL hopes with thrilling 2-0 win over Bayern Munich
thread.title_full: Arsenal revive CL hopes with thrilling 2-0 win over Bayern Munich - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Arsenal revive CL hopes with thrilling 2-0 win over Bayern Munich
text:
*London:* Arsenal produced a resilient performance as they secured a thrilling 2-0 win over Bayern Munich to revive their hopes of reaching the Champions League knockout phase at Emirates Stadium.
*Arsenal's German midfielder Mesut Ozil (R) celebrates scoring his team's second goal during the UEFA Champions League football match ... Â»
